sentence: Why did the scarecrow win the nobel prize? because he was *out standing in his field*!
explanation: first meaning relates to being upright or erect
first_new_sentence: The soldier was standing at attention during the ceremony.
second_new_sentence: The property was standing vacant for many years.

sentence: What did you hear about the shoemaker who went bankrupt? he was insolevent
explanation: first meaning refers to the bottom part of a shoe
first_new_sentence: The sole of the shoe fell off while I was walking.
second_new_sentence: The sole survivor of the shipwreck shared her harrowing tale.

sentence: These entries capture the essence of your request by presenting the dual-meaning words in a clear format that can be used for a CSV file.
